div.p:
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxij die mensis
Septembris Anno quo supra

The samyn day Androw bell was in ane Amerciament of the court
be his avne tonge grant for the wranguis' strubulance
and strikinge of William harpar yongar to amend as law
wile and forber in tyme to cum

div.head: chamer muresone
div.p:
The xxv day of September' the yer' of god jM iiijC nyntj
and tua yeris In presence of thomas fyf and androw Culane
eldar tua ballieis gilbert muresone with consent and assent
of Jonet his spous' assignit his haile half nethis fischingis
of the pot to Alexander chamer of murchill his ayris and assignais for
this next yer' to cum for certane salmond' acht to him
the said' gilbert oblisinge him to pay the maile of the said'
fischingis to the aldirman and ballieis of the said' yir' and to freith'
the said' Alexander his ayris assignez' and subtennentis of the said'
yeris maile Ande gif he falyeis tharintill than he assignit
and be this present ak assignis with consent of his said spous'
the said demi nethis fischinge with the pertinence to the saide
Alexander his ayris and assignais for the tua yeris next thareftir fol
louing fre of al thingis thai payand' the maile to the
tone' alanerly to the kepin of the quhilkis the saide Jonet sweir'
the gret bodely aithe befor thir witnes sere Jhon' ruthirfurd'
Richerd ruthirfurd' thomas mar' Androw branche and Williame
blinsele with vthir diuers'

Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta
in pretorio eiusdem primo die mensis Octobris Anno Domini
millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo secundo

Quo die dominus
Johannes ruthirfurd de tarlane miles electus fuit in officium
prepositure pro Anno futuro prestito Solito Juramento

Eodem die Alexander chamer filius thomas fyf Johannes
menyeis et Dauid prat electi fuerunt in officium ballivorum
pro Anno Instante prestitis solitis Juramentis

Eodem die philippus Dunbrek Andreas nachty Duncanus
Straloche et thomas Jamesone fuerunt Electi in officium
sergeandorum prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Eodem die thomas prat thomas mar' Andreas Wentone
Dauid prat et Willelmus andirson senior electi fuerunt
Ad off Audiend' vidend' considerand' ostentand' exonerand' et
concludend' compotum Johannes Culane in officio prepositure
Anno elapso prestitis solitis Juramentis

The samyn day Androw Watsone grantit him borghe' to
thome narne for tene merkis quhilkis ballieis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

Eodem die ballivi dederunt in mandatis thome Jameson'
premunire andream litstar ad feriam Sextam responsurus thome
narne vt iura volunt

Eodem die Elizabeth' gordone domina de bernis fecit
constituit creauit et nominauit Eduardum malisone et
Willelmum ravok coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores legittimos
ad petendum exigendum recipiendum vniuersos annuos
redditus sibi infra dictum burgensem contingen' et de receptis
acquitand' prosequend' et defendend' promitten' de Rato
et grato

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum matheum
nicholson procuratorem capellanorum Collegij de Abirdene deductis de et
super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis Cuiusdam terre
Jacentis infra dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex orientali parte
eiusdem vici inter terram quondam Richardi Kintor ex australi et
terram Altaris beati petri ex boreali in defectu solucionis vnius annij annuj redditus
decim s' dictis capellanis a longo tempore debit' et non solut'
vnde dictus capellanus et Johannes Colison suus prelocutor pecierunt
a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et Justi
cie complementum Tunc Curia mature auisiata decreuit
quod dicti capellanj de Collegio possessionem et proprietatem
dicte terre legittime recuperarunt in defectu solucionis dicti
annuj redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamson
Judicatoris Curie pro Judicio Datum fuit Teste Curia

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per Willelmum andirson seniorem
deductis de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis Cuiusdam
terre Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram quondam roberti nevisone ex australi et terram Andree
ranison ex boreali in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus iiijor s'
dicto Willelmo a longo tempore debit' et non solut' vnde dictus Willelmus
peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus precedentis Juris et Justicie
complementum Tunc Curia auisiata decreuit quod dictus Willelmus
possessionem et proprietatem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu
solucionis dicti annuj redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis William
sone Judicatoris Curie pro Judicio datum fuit Teste Curia

Eodem die accedens domini Andreas gray et matheus nicholson collectores
et procuratores capellanorum Collegij de Abirdene ad barram protestati sunt pro vno
annuo redditu x s' dictis capellanis annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in vico nauium ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
Johannis fechat ex boriali et terram quondam Johannis andirson ex australi
Ad quam terram accedens nichil repierunt distringibile preter terram et
lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentauit in Curia tanquam 3o
die huius processus Testibus Alexandro Kennarty Willelmo gibson' et Andrea
nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Willelmus andirsone Junior et protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo Redditu iiijor s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam
terra vasta Jacente in vico nauium inter terram Johannis fechat ex boreali
et terram quondam Johannis andirson ex australi ad quam terram accedens
nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos balliuis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam 3o die huius processus Testibus thoma quhit
Alexandro ranisone et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Robertus blinsel protestatus
fuit pro vno annuo redditu vij s' sibi annuatim debit' de quadam terra
vasta Jacente in futy inter terram Willelmi harpar ex australi et terram
Johannis matlande ex boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit
distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo
presentauit in Curia tanquam 3o die huius processus Testibus
Dauid Duffous' Donaldo Scot et Andrea nachty seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Johannes blak procurator magistri Willelmi
Strachin et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo Redditu xviij s' sibi
magistro Willelmo et altari beati Johannis baptiste debit' et non solut'
annuatim de quadam terra vasta in vico nauium ex orientali parte eiusdem
vici inter terram gilberti riburne ex australi et terram Jacobi
Kintor ex boreali ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in sacculo presentavit in curia
tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Andrea Devy laurencius
talyour et thoma Jamesone seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Andreas culan procurator Alexandri simson'
et protestatus fuit pro vno annuo redditu Sex s' et viij d' de
terra vasta Jacente in vico superiore ecclesie ex australi parte eiusdem
vici inter terram quondam thome Waus ex orientali et terram henrici
de Tulideff ex occidentali Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit
in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus Johannis
brogane thoma buchane et Duncano straloche seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram Johannes matlande et protestatus fuit
pro vno annuo red

the samyn day Jonhne Colison forspekar for Alexander of mar fand'
ane borghe' in the hande of philp Dunbrek officiar' that Alexander
mar' hed recouerit the properte and possession' of ane land' liand'
in the gallougat betuix the land' of Eduard top one the northt
of the lande of Dauid prat one the southt partis in defalt of
pament of ane annual rent of s' acht to him and askit
ward and dome And' in continent thomas rolland' reconterit
the said borghe sayand' he acht nocht to haue ward and dome
for he hed' recouerit the said land' obefor and was in posse
ssion' of it / quhilkis borghe' and recounter the aldirman and balyeis
continevit for waknes of the court to the law day eftir yule
next to Cum without preiudice of ony party
thomas blak patrik stablar' and t Jameson'

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio tercio die octobris Anno
quo supra

The said day Jonhne moire grantit that he ressauit fra Alexander
rede j li' gretis of squair' money quhen the ros' noble' gaf
ix s' g' quhilk the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of
law to the said' Alexander

the said day Malcum crage for Dauid Duffous' and wthiris merchandis
follouit Alexander chamer of murchil Robert blinsele and thomas prat
for certan somes of money that thai aucht tham quhilkis
thai allegit thame pait to the mene of Danskin iij for
the saidez Alexander robert and thomas and vthiris nichtbouris and quhilkis
the saidez personis denyit And' in continent it was put to the
decision' of ane assis' Suorne tharto quhilk riplie avisit
deliuerit and fand' the said' Alexander robert and thomas quyt of
al Somes of money and gudis aucht to the men' of Danskin
and nor to the saidez merchandis In thar' namys be the moutht of
thomas mar forspekar of the samyn

The saide day Dauid Duffous In the nayme of him
and his fallouis Solemptlie protestit quhat that malcum
crage hede done or spokin anent the gudis gevin be tham
to the men' of Danskin this day suld turne him nor tham
to nay preiudice becaus' he hed nay pouer' of tham tharto
as he allegit

Curia gilde burgi de Abirdene tenta
in pretorio eiusdem quinto die Octobris Anno quo
supra

div.head: Appreciatores carnium
div.p:
Dauid spens Johannes Duvarde thomas gardiner'
Willelmus philp henricus bavne Jacobus Kennarty
henricus Crage et Willelmus murray

Evin quartar Dauid prat balye
Will sprute Jonhne covis' and laurence talyour
Crukit quartar Alexander chamer balye
Jonhne Scot and Jonhne rede
futy quartar thomas fyf balye
Alexander talyoure Jonhne bogy and Donald bandone
greyne quartar Jonhne l menyeis balye
Richerd talyour and Will Scharpe

The said day the ballieis assignit monunday cum aucht dais
to Androw murray eldar to ansuer to the borghe' strekit apon
him be Jonhne blak for the wranguis' haldin of ane
windew and ane wattir stane

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem Octauo die
octobris Anno quo supra

the samyn day Williame buchane grantit him avande
to W thome athoile vij s' quhilkis the ballieis chargit
him to pay within terme of law

the samyn day Dauid adamsone become Souerte be his
hand' vphaldin to the ballieis to entir Williame scherar'
befor thame within the tolbutht one friday cum viij dais
to abide and vndirlie the decisione of ane suorne assis' anent
the iij li' of money pait be Jonhne grige for the said William
to Jonhne Stronoche and gif the said' William aw to refund'
him the said' iij li'

the samyn day Jonet gray quyt of ane curche follouit be
canny brogan

the said day Jonhne fechat was quyt be ane suorne
assis' Androw branche forspekar of ane barrel tar' follouit
be richerd' Watsone

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die
octobris Anno quo supra

The saide day it was statute and ordanit be the aldirman
balyeis and diuers' of the Consale that the baxtaris sal baik
xxvj vnce of wele bakin breide gude Stuf and cleyn'
for ij d' and penny brede extendinge to xiij bredis vnce
vndir the payn' of law

the samyn day it was Statute and ordanit that al candilmakaris
sal make the pvnde of Candill cleyne talche dry wekis
for iij d' vndir the payne of law

The samyn day it was Statut' and ordanit that nay flessaris
sele talche to fremmit mene nor' vteuthe the tone' vndir
the payne of law

The samyn day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monunday that next
cumis to Jonhne thomsone litstar thome litilJonhne to ansuer to the
borghe' strekit one him be Jonhne thomsone litstar for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of j barrel of ays'

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monunday cum viij dais
to Conny menyeis to preif the skath sustenit be hir' in Jonhne of
Kintorris hous' in his defalt'

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit monunday that next cumis
to Jonhne Kintor to ansuer to the borghe' strekit one him be Jonhne
litstar for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xvj s' Scottis money

The said day it was deliuerit and fundin be the court that Jonhne
of Culane falyeit in the deposicion of his aithe ordanit him be
ane suorne assis' thomas mar' forspekar anent the biinge of certane
Inglis clatht be the day assignit to him tharofor he is condempnit in
xxj s' g' sicklik pament as the saide Jonhne is ordanit to pay to
Alexander rede to be pait to the saide Jonhne moire within terme of
law
